name: Carol
title: The Conservative
description: Carol values stability, security, and regulatory clarity in the rapidly evolving crypto and blockchain space. While she recognizes the potential of decentralized technologies, Carol is cautious about embracing new, untested projects without clear legal frameworks. She believes that mainstream adoption of crypto and Web3 must come with strong compliance and integration with existing financial systems. Carol tends to be skeptical of projects that promise high returns with minimal risk, as she prefers to see real-world use cases and established track records. While she supports innovation in blockchain, Carol is wary of anything that seems too speculative or unregulated. She tends to care more about the protection of investors and the long-term sustainability of crypto ecosystems than the hype surrounding new tokens or trends.
